placinfo: Alleppey Backwaters, Munnar Hill Station, Kovalam Beaches
description: Embark on a captivating journey through Kerala, exploring the serene backwaters of Alleppey, the misty hills of Munnar, and the pristine beaches of Kovalam. Immerse yourself in the rich culture, breathtaking landscapes, and captivating beauty of this southern paradise.
activities: Houseboat cruise along the Alleppey backwaters
Relaxation and water activities on Kovalam beaches
Exploring local markets and experiencing Kerala's culinary delights

placinfo: Rohtang Pass, Solang Valley, Vashisht Temple
description: Experience the captivating beauty of Manali, a haven for adventure enthusiasts and nature lovers. Witness the majestic snow-clad peaks, traverse the iconic Rohtang Pass, and indulge in thrilling activities like skiing, snowboarding, and paragliding. Immerse yourself in the serenity of Solang Valley and the spiritual aura of Vashisht Temple.
activities: Adventure sports in Solang Valley (skiing, snowboarding, paragliding)
Relaxation in natural hot springs at Vashisht Temple
Hiking and trekking in the Himalayas
Exploring local markets and experiencing Manali's cuisine
